name: ColosseoEAS
tag_list: score-boards, arena-system-management, stadium-management, scoring-systems, stadium-security, arena-security, face-recognition-software, real-time-face-recognition, led-lighting-technologies
overview:
Colosseo is a complex video management system employing the latest LED, wireless and security technologies to arena and stadium owners to ensure fans get the fullest, yet safest, possible experience at live sporting events.

Colosseo has created a unique solution for sports arena management systems that offers the highest level of security and maximum comfort for all visitors of sporting and cultural events.

An HD data transfer allows fans to see every detail from the game from anywhere in the stadium. The highest quality graphics guarantee a fantastic fan experience in every stadium, arena and pool. This experience is supported by multiple audio and visual effects.

Additionally Colosseo has eliminated the need for multiple vendors providing different services and systems to sporting arenas. Smart telemetry avoids system black-outs and easy touch-screen manipulation lowers the demand for personnel. Security is maintained by a flexible identification system where event organizers can control the whole stadium or arena area and identify troublemakers quickly and easily.

Colosseo also includes a video referee and other video enhancements. Complex statistics provide real time information and help players focus on their specific activities. Video referee system assures that there is no doubt about the referees’ decisions. Every detail from the game can be transferred to the information screen within a second.

The new Colosseo arena management system uses the latest technologies and opens doors to new ways of entertainment for all sports fans.
